title: Build a Full Agentic System
subtitle: AI AGENT BOOTCAMP
details: Build full AI agents with perception, memory, reasoning, and planning
Master the stack: embedding search, tool use, RAG, and LangGraph
Learn to simulate autonomous agents that interact with APIs, documents, and humans
Design your own Tesla-style AI-first planning system — but for general-purpose reasoning
about: A complete, industry-level AI Agent Development Program — from zero to fully autonomous LLM-powered systems. You'll go from understanding basic logic to deploying agents that act independently using tools, memory, and reasoning.

whoIsThisFor.title: Students & New Engineers
whoIsThisFor.description: Learn the most practical AI skills of 2025 and get ahead in the AI revolution.

whoIsThisFor.title: Working Professionals
whoIsThisFor.description: Get upskilled in LLM engineering and agentic systems to advance your career.

whoIsThisFor.title: Career Switchers
whoIsThisFor.description: Go from novice to job-ready in under 2 months with hands-on projects.

instructor.name: Harpreet Singh
instructor.bio: Harpreet Singh is a Full Self-Driving (FSD) & Robotics Engineer with 5+ years of expertise in AI-driven autonomy, specializing in motion planning, computer vision, and simulation, who has mentored 10,000+ students globally while founding two award-winning Robotics/AI startups recognized by Startup India and Punjab Government, combining deep technical knowledge in AI decision-making and sensor fusion with a passion for advancing intelligent systems through engineering, education and entrepreneurship.
